TopicTitle: Need help installing Old School Fairings for KW Rocketry

Articles.Content: Hey, I am really needing help with installing the KW Rocketry cfg for Felbourn's Old School Fairings. I have no idea what I need to be doing. Can someone please provide me with an example of it being done right? No idea of what goes where and I am afraid of messing up my favorite fairings (I hate KW Rocketry's new Procedural ones)
